name: Monarch doors
description: MONARCH door adds a glazed feature panel to a front, external or internal door in way to instantly introduce a touch of class to your home. At HIGHNESS, we have a range of smart solutions for your glass doors. From single and double glazed doors to exclusively manufactured materials, our doors are designed to keep your home safe and stylish.
size: Door + Frame 57-100 cm, Door Only 50-95 cm
